title: Review IT Asset Management
description: An IT auditor reviews the process for tracking IT assets like laptops and servers.

tasks.description: Obtain the complete IT asset inventory from the asset management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor has the master list of all recorded IT assets.

tasks.description: Select a sample of 30 assets from the list and perform a physical verification to ensure they exist and are in the correct location.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor finds that 3 of the sampled laptops cannot be located.

tasks.description: Recommend a more frequent cycle of physical inventory counts to improve the accuracy of the asset inventory.
tasks.expected_outcome: A recommendation is made to improve the asset tracking process.
